title: Rachel Stowell
text:
Rachel "Macca" Stowell (née McArthur; born 27 July 1977) is a former <a href="England">English</a> <a href="Women%27s%20football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> player, who played as a central <a href="midfielder">midfielder</a>. She finished her career with <a href="Leicester%20City%20W.F.C.">Leicester City Women</a> after season 2009–10, and is a former member of the <a href="England%20women%27s%20national%20football%20team">England</a> squad.
Club career.
Stowell joined <a href="Bristol%20City%20W.F.C.%20%281990s%29">Bristol City Women</a> aged 12 and played with her local club for seven years before moving to <a href="Southampton%20Saints%20L.F.C.">Southampton Saints</a>. With Southampton, Stowell played in the 1999 <a href="FA%20Women%27s%20Cup">FA Women's Cup</a> final. She was a full-time professional player with <a href="Fulham%20L.F.C.">Fulham</a> from 2000 until 2003. Stowell later played for Bristol City Ladies again, <a href="Arsenal%20L.F.C.">Arsenal Ladies</a> and <a href="Leeds%20Carnegie%20L.F.C.">Leeds United Ladies</a>. Stowell joined <a href="Leicester%20City%20W.F.C.">Leicester City</a> after a period of inactivity after childbirth and an <a href="Anterior%20cruciate%20ligament">ACL</a> injury. She captained Leicester to third place in the 2009–10 <a href="FA%20Women%27s%20Premier%20League%20Northern%20Division">FA Women's Premier League Northern Division</a>, then retired at the end of the season.
International career.
Stowell made her senior <a href="England%20women%27s%20national%20football%20team">England</a> debut against <a href="Norway%20women%27s%20national%20football%20team">Norway</a>, playing at right-back in a 3–1 defeat at the <a href="Algarve%20Cup">Algarve Cup</a> in March 2002.
Personal life.
She married former <a href="Wolverhampton%20Wanderers%20F.C.">Wolves</a> <a href="Goalkeeper%20%28association%20football%29">goalkeeper</a> <a href="Mike%20Stowell">Mike Stowell</a> in June 2009, following the birth of their daughter in April of the previous year. The two married whilst they both were in Leicester. Rachel being a Leicester City Women's player and her husband, Mike Stowell, being the goalkeeping coach at <a href="Leicester%20City%20FC">Leicester City FC</a>
